column3:
“The heavy narcotic indica I was searching for.

This underrated gem is a proper night time med.  As a sufferer of ulcerative colitis, Black D helps to keep the cramping down and kill the pain, stress and anxiety associated with chronic illness. This allows for a peaceful nights rest when it is needed most.

Overall a very effective tool for helping to combat the hellish effects of disease.  It allows one to ease ...”

“Black Domina is easily my favorite strain of weed, and I say this as someone who smokes indicas and sativas equally. What really sets this strain apart is the powerful, narcotic euphoria that comes with a BD high. The feeling is like nothing else, but it has similarities with opiates. The body starts with euphoric waves radiating from the center of your chest, your eyes, your forearms, etc. Sex is far more pleasurabl...”

“I got an eighth of this stuff and it was definitely worth it!
When I picked a nug out of the container, I could immediately tell it was a high quality bud. The nugs were completely caked with trich's and were also had a distinct lime green color to them.

You don't need much of this to feel good. A quick snapper will do. Maybe 2 snappers if you're a daily user. 

CAUTION

:+: Relatively new users should stay a...”
“Amazing strain strong high very tasty”

“Wow! What a strain. Probably the strongest indica I've ever had. Absolutely covered in crystals. Extremely smooth to vape, and excellent in flavor. 
You're likely not to remember specific details about your evening vaping this one.”
“The fruity smell is intoxicating, and the taste is even better. Let me tell you, I consider myself to be King Indica"
column4: and this flavor is SUPREMELY relaxing. It feels very heavy
column5: but in a way that melts all your anxieties away. I'd recommend this flavor to any other connoisseurs of indica.”"

column3:
“I've been trying to be more picky with my 5 stars when I'm rating a strain. However this strains an easy 5 stars. Lately I've been trying a few strains with this as a parent; Sweet Black Angel, Black Mamba, and Black Ice. All as wonderful as the parent. It is such a good sedative. 
I have been on methadone for a few years yet ironically have insomnia, for awhile benedryl/every PM over the counter medicine was my go t...”

“Black Domina, She is the Sandwoman. Opposite Sandman. Black Domina will put you in the nice sweet spot euphoric mood for a bit and then slowly slip you into a comfortable relaxed mood. 

Eventually leading to a nice restful sleep that once upon you is immediate and you sleep. NOW. SLEEP NOW.

I have light anxiety and my wife has severe anxiety. This is THE strain for us.  I've tried many strains to help her and this ...”

“My caretaker chose this strain for me a few months ago, and I can still remember the look, smell, taste and of course the relief I got after smoking Black Domina.  It wasn't harsh like other strains I had experienced.  It's potent and certainly squashes any pain or discomfort.

I use a 3-chamber grinder for my bud. Using this type of grinder is the best to catch kief. One of the greatest things about Black Domina is ...”

“Black Domina is a quality indica strain, which you'll notice immediately. The buds have a beautiful purple tone, especially in the middle of the dense, reisinous buds. The scent is dark and spicy, with strong tones of blackberry, and a hint of hash.

The high does not diappoint, like the previous reviewer seemed to think. It delivers everything one would expect from an indica, with a deep, calm stone that is still ...”

“Got an eight for myself but I had to invite some friends over cuz this is definetely a knock-out strain. 
High lasts 3 hours and no paraneua for my friends and me. Munchies do not hit too hard, hot cheetos should do the trick! Dry/cotton mouth was present but I‘d say only 5/10, water will cure it.
Found myself very talkactive and excited although it is an Indica strain. If you have the chance to try this please give ...”

“North Coast Growers out of Washington was the cut I tried.   Let me start off by saying wow!  I'm a concentrate guy through and through, however, this delectable strain was calling my name.  Super dense nugs, my 1/8th was 3 medium sized nugs.  Super super dense.  Purple, glistening under my phone light.  Perfect trim job.  Breaking these buds down for bong hits and I smell purple, candy, and a musky pepper.  1 snap o...”

“WHOA!!  I love indicas and this is one to definitely put on your list if you're like me.  I like to literally get SO relaxed at night that I fall blissfully asleep with the bong in my hand.  Black Domina does just that.  If you have pain or sleep issues, this strain is perfect for you.  Coming from a lineage of four other indicas, this one packs a punch with both pain and insomnia, not to mention the fact that it get...”

“good mellow high. good if you want some pain relief or migraine relief. When I get the onset signs of a potential migraine, I smoke a .5g joint and make an espresso. the strain i got wasn't high in thc% but it had nice cbd%. So I guess it did what I wanted it to do. Wasn't pumped on the smell, probably an older cure for the cbd%.”

“Not a big fan of Black Domina though I don't hate it either. It made me paranoid a little. A positive aspect of it is that after a couples of anxiety incident on this strain I learned how to control such incidents and ride'em through.  It also made me understand what a person with a mental illness feels like 24/7 while at best I felt like for an hour.So I gained more respect for some peoples (liked mentally broken pe...”
“very good strains for the very low donation of 25 dollars an 1/8”

“This is Black Domina delivered via the most excellent O.Pen CO2 extracted oil. This was my first time with the lady, so I wasn't quite sure what to expect. As such, I was not prepared for her to be as much of a creeper" as she turned out to be!

column1: As many who've first smoked (or in my case
column2: vaped the oil of) the Black Domina
column3: she comes on very slow and easy before she totally takes control of your mind and body. I f...”"
“Awesome nighttime smoke.  Black Dominia might be the best strain I've tried for insomnia.  Smells very... purple.  Sweet taste, too.  One of my favorites!”

“a nice flora mix  of a smooth spicey musk similar to the hindu with sweet purple undertones that made for yummy...   Very cerebral or psycho active . This would be great for a show or even just a movie as it really gives you that emphatic feeling like everything is alive around you and your body is just buzzing.  Couple that with an almost narcotic warmth going through the body and you have a truly special experience...”

“maybe some of the best weed I've smoked in a really fucking long time.

a little bit goes a long way - gets you really baked and keeps you really baked.

good for cuddling.”
“I had heard a lot of buzz" about Black Domina.  I'm an Indica guy
column4: so I was curious like a cat (most of my friends call me 'Whiskers')!  I picked up a gram just to try it out and I was sold as soon as the first hit was exhaled.  Maybe not the strongest I've ever had
column5: but up there in my top five all-time favorites.  The taste is fruity
column6: yet potent of rich hash flavor.  The high was instant and long lasting (an hour-l...”"

column3: “Really nice relaxing strain, super couch locking. Good for bedtime.”

“Got some at Botanico 

  Good stuff, 
The effects are more clear headed than I expected. 

Did the job for pain relief.   

No extra anxiety 

The bud is really well produced, dried nice and peppery 

Got some live resin (I think may have been wax)
That was really amazing. 

I would like to have this in my line up, I would imagine that it would be a nice strain to use while one tinkered 

Add, pain, anxiety”

“This is my favorite strain of marijuana, bar none, and I smoke a lot of marijuana. Why do I say that? Well first of all BD hits you hard with a narcotic punch to the chest, face, eyes and arms. It's a feeling of warm bliss like nothing else - almost like an opiate buzz. To make things better there are distinct phases to the high. You start off being fascinated by light. Everything is much more vivid. Leaves look blu...”"

“great strain to relax and just do nothing but. good strain for bedtime smoked heavily. smells peppery, slight citrus sweet smell. it does have a harsh ish inhale. I'd recommend this for a meal with friends. giggles and a $#/! load of food.”

“Great strain I haven't had for about 8 years now. Loved it's buzz, and would jump on it immediately if it came available to me. Totally a favorite.”
“Very powerful indica. Pure indica. You get no head High at all it’s almost like it’s a narcotic. Great for night use and all around lounging. Don’t expect too do much after using Black D.”

“I used this for some late at night relaxation and it did not disappoint. It hit very hard and leaves you feeling very relaxed and calm, great for if you have insomnia or have some condition that makes sleep difficult. 

I would recommend this strain if: it's late and you are going to sleep or watching a late movie.

I wouldn't recommend this strain if: you are at a party or it's not dark out yet, as this strain will ...”

I took a few hits from a vape and felt great, but also crazy sleepy with the onset (this wore off a lil and I was able to take the dog out) but then I smoked it and I began to have dark thoughts and it felt like the inside of my brain was gooey. Once my Nightmare Before Christmas  thoughts calmed down I passed out hard and had pleasant sleep.”

“This strain has a very earthy, rich look, flavor & smell to it.  A 90% Indica, it will take your stress & pain away.  Not the best to smoke during the day when you have things to accomplish.  This batch may not be quite as potent as the last batch I tried, but it definitely does the trick.”

“I have thoroughly enjoyed my few experiences with this lovely lady. I started growing my own soon after I started smoking, but this was the best weed that I ever purchased on the black market." Numbs your body and mind. Although it made me want to stay on the couch

column5: the trick with heavy indicas is to already have an activity in place

“It's intense, hard-hitting, fruity, and relaxing. I smoked this for a week or so and it was an amazing week. great head high with enough body tingles to keep me coming back. Delicious, sticky buds were packing a huge punch. coughed my ass off.”
“Insomnia relief and very cerebral :)”

“Black Domina is a great strain for when you're sick. It increases your appetite, has noticeable anti-inflammatory effects (great for swollen nasal passages), and can put you to sleep if you're being kept up by symptoms. It's wonderful for stress relief, providing users with intense but grounded relaxation. In small doses this can be a great pick-me-up in the morning but too much and the deep body stone will have you ...”
“Really enjoyed it”
“My friends and I really enjoyed this strain. Very relaxing. It has a dank taste and aroma.”
“good work best harwest on lamp or 1000g luxury plant”

“Inidica muy, pero muy relajante.

“Black Domina has a strong earthy scent with undertones of like citrus and chestnut I really enjoy the combination of smell/flavor in this strain. The high comes on pretty quick uplifting for the first couple hits then it hits u with an extremely sleepy/relaxing body sensation, really euphoric, amazing for pain, anxiety and insomnia great strain works well for me 5 out of 5!!!" :D”"
“Quick, strong. Very giggly. A little goes a long way...ease into it. I forgot I was in pain. A new favorite.”

“This strain is amazing. It's a lot of the best of both, the indica side and the sativa side. It's not a downer, but has a good body high. It's giggly and cerebral. It's outgoing and contemplative.”

“A beautiful way to end a day. I vape a bowl and smoke a bowl after of this beautiful bud every night.

“Definitely a unique strain. The fragrance is rather pleasing. This is the first strain that I picked up that ever had a scent of ground black pepper or spices.

“This strain straight”

“The weed smells very good ! It reminded me a bit of blueberry (the other strain) with a touch of citrus towards the end. The taste was a little bit harsh and good" overall.

column2: it would get my mind into some body trip. I am currently really high on this strain
column3: and my whole body is kind of "buzzing"
column4: a bit like if my body was having a lot of electricity in it. My head feels really swollen.

column3: “I've never found Black Domina to be anything to write home about, and this time is no different. The high is very mild, just giving me slow introspective high, that while relaxing still leaves the mind happy to turn over new ideas. I suspect it would be great for lower tolerance smokers who need anxiety relief while still remaining functional, but for us high tolerance smokes it doesn't seem to do as much of a the tr...”
“Quick, weak buzz.”
